message.body: None of my surge can get past login in intellaverse
Sue & Christian did not receive page 11 of the surge manual in their emails
I did send them a copy of the surge manual I received with that crucial page 11
they did follow page 11 to the t and were successful in logging in their time
I will speak to Lori tomorrow about following page 11 so she will be logging in her hours tomorrow
Nice! How dos they not get page 11? Let me know so I can correct it.
Don't know why it's missing from their email but is on mine
But it's all good now. Will get Lori straightened out tomorrow
